title: Walmart's journey to $1T: 2 changes that have boosted the stock
full_text: Walmart's journey to $1T: 2 changes that have boosted the stock. Walmart (WMT) could be the next company to hit a $1 trillion market capitalization. UBS US food retail analyst Michael Lasser joins Market Domination.... Well, good, Walmart be the next company to join the trillion-dollar club. With its current market cap just above 900 billion, the stock needs to rise by about 11% to hit that trillion-dollar mileston… [+2187 chars]
